info.name: Dashboard Monitor Tender API
info.description: Complete API documentation for Dashboard Monitor Tender Management System

request.description:
Get current logged in user information

**Example Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Data pengguna berhasil diambil",
    "data": {
        "id": "c98fb4c2-3b6f-41bd-b39d-3df3e01fc3e7",
        "username": "admin",
        "email": "admin@tender.com",
        "nama_lengkap": "Administrator",
        "role": "admin",
        "foto_profil": "https://example.com/profiles/admin.jpg",
        "is_active": true,
        "created_at": "2025-10-01T08:00:00.000Z"
    }
}
```

Change current user password

**Example Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Password berhasil diubah"
}
```

Logout current user

**Example Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Logout berhasil"
}
```

query.description: Search by username, email, or nama_lengkap

request.description:
Get all users (Admin only). Supports filtering and pagination.

**Example Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Data semua pengguna berhasil diambil",
    "data": [
        {
            "id": "a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-1234-567890abcdef",
            "username": "petugas1",
            "email": "petugas1@tender.com",
            "nama_lengkap": "Petugas Lapangan 1",
            "role": "petugas",
            "is_active": true
        }
    ],
    "meta": {
        "page": 1,
        "limit": 10,
        "total_pages": 3,
        "total_items": 25
    }
}
```

Get user details by ID (Admin only)

**Example Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Data pengguna berhasil ditemukan",
    "data": {
        "id": "a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-1234-567890abcdef",
        "username": "petugas1",
        "email": "petugas1@tender.com",
        "nama_lengkap": "Petugas Lapangan 1",
        "role": "petugas",
        "foto_profil": null,
        "is_active": true,
        "created_at": "2025-10-02T10:00:00.000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-10-02T10:00:00.000Z"
    }
}
```

Create new user (Admin only). If password not provided, default is 'password123'

**Example Success Response (201 Created):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Pengguna baru berhasil dibuat",
    "data": {
        "id": "b2c3d4e5-f6a7-8901-2345-67890abcdef1",
        "username": "petugas4",
        "email": "petugas4@tender.com",
        "nama_lengkap": "Petugas Lapangan 4",
        "role": "petugas",
        "is_active": true
    }
}
```

Update user (Admin only)

**Example Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Pengguna berhasil diperbarui",
    "data": {
        "id": "b2c3d4e5-f6a7-8901-2345-67890abcdef1",
        "username": "petugas4_updated",
        "email": "petugas4.updated@tender.com",
        "nama_lengkap": "Petugas Lapangan 4 Updated",
        "role": "petugas"
    }
}
```

Soft delete user (Admin only)

**Example Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Pengguna berhasil dihapus"
}
```

Get all events. Admin/Supervisor see all, Petugas see only assigned events.

**Example Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Data semua tender berhasil diambil",
    "data": [
        {
            "id": "evt-12345",
            "nama_tender": "Pembangunan Jembatan Merah Putih",
            "lokasi": "Ambon",
            "status": "on_progress",
            "progress_percentage": 65.5,
            "tanggal_selesai": "2026-08-17T00:00:00.000Z"
        }
    ],
    "meta": {
        "page": 1,
        "limit": 10,
        "total_pages": 2,
        "total_items": 15
    }
}
```

Create new event (Admin only)

**Example Success Response (201 Created):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Tender baru berhasil dibuat",
    "data": {
        "id": "evt-99999",
        "nama_tender": "Pembangunan Gedung Sekolah",
        "lokasi": "Tangerang",
        "status": "planning",
        "created_at": "2025-10-03T10:00:00.000Z"
    }
}
```

Update event (Admin only)

**Example Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Tender berhasil diperbarui",
    "data": {
        "id": "evt-99999",
        "nama_tender": "Pembangunan Gedung Sekolah Updated",
        "lokasi": "Tangerang Selatan",
        "budget": 13000000000,
        "status": "on_progress"
    }
}
```

Soft delete event (Admin only)

**Example Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Tender berhasil dihapus"
}
```

Assign multiple petugas to event (Admin only)

**Example Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Petugas berhasil ditugaskan ke tender"
}
```

Remove petugas from event (Admin only)

**Example Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Petugas berhasil dihapus dari tender"
}
```

Get all milestones for specific event

**Example Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Milestone untuk tender berhasil diambil",
    "data": [
        {
            "id": "mil-abcde",
            "nama_milestone": "Pengecoran Pilar Utama",
            "status": "completed",

        },
        {
            "id": "mil-fghij",
            "nama_milestone": "Pemasangan Rangka Baja",
            "status": "on_progress",
            "deadline": "2025-12-20T00:00:00.000Z",
            "urutan": 2
        }
    ]
}
```

Get milestone details by ID

**Example Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Detail milestone berhasil diambil",
    "data": {
        "id": "mil-fghij",
```

}

request.description:
Create new milestone for event (Admin only)

**Example Success Response (201 Created):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Milestone baru berhasil dibuat",
    "data": {
        "id": "mil-klmno",
        "event_id": "evt-12345",
        "nama_milestone": "Finishing dan Pengecatan",
        "deadline": "2026-07-01T00:00:00.000Z",
        "status": "pending",
        "urutan": 3
    }
}
```

Update milestone (Admin only)

**Example Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Milestone berhasil diperbarui",
    "data": {
        "id": "mil-fghij",
        "nama_milestone": "Testing dan QA Updated",
        "deadline": "2025-12-05T00:00:00.000Z",
        "status": "on_progress"
    }
}
```

Soft delete milestone (Admin only)

**Example Success Response (200 OK):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Milestone berhasil dihapus"
}
```

Create progress report with photos (Petugas only). Must be assigned to the event.

**Example Success Response (201 Created):**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Laporan progress berhasil dibuat",
    "data": {
        "id": "prog-5432",
        "event_id": "evt-12345",
        "milestone_id": "mil-fghij",
        "deskripsi": "Pekerjaan hari ini berjalan lancar.",
        "persentase_progress": 80.0,
        "tanggal_laporan": "2025-11-26T00:00:00.000Z",
        "photos": [
            "https://img.server.com/path/to/new_photo.jpg"
        ]
    }
}
```
Update progress report (Owner only). Can add more photos.
Soft delete progress report (Owner only)
Get dashboard statistics (Admin & Supervisor only)
Get events summary with progress percentage (Admin & Supervisor only)
Get recent progress activities (Admin & Supervisor only)
Pre-upload photos before creating progress report (Petugas only). Returns array of image URLs.
Check if server is running
